paintingLabel: Under the Pandanus (I Raro te Oviri)
description: A tropical landscape featuring a group of brown-skinned figures, likely women, gathered around a fire pit, surrounded by lush greenery and tall pandanus leaves. The setting sun casts a warm orange glow on the scene, with a few wispy clouds drifting across the sky. The figures are adorned in traditional attire, with intricate patterns and designs, while their faces are depicted with quiet contemplation or gentle conversation.
